00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"

00046 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 typedef enum {Fail = 0, Pass = !Fail} TestResult;
00048 
00049 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 #define I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS     0x0A
00051 #define I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS      0x60
00052 #define BufferSize             16
00053 #define ClockSpeed             1000000
00054 
00055 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00057 void I2C_Configuration(void);
00058 void I2C_Loopback(void);
00059 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength);
00060 
00061 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00062 u8 I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx[BufferSize] = {0};
00063 u8 I2C_Slave_Buffer_Tx[BufferSize] = {0x00, 0x11, 0x22, 0x33,
00064                                       0x44, 0x55, 0x66, 0x77,
00065                                       0x88, 0x99, 0xAA, 0xBB,
00066                                       0xCC, 0xDD, 0xEE, 0xFF};
00067 
00068 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00069 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00070   * @brief  Main program.
00071   * @retval None
00072   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00073 int main(void)
00074 {
00075   /* Initialize LED1 & LED2 on HT32 board                                                                   */
00076   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00077   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED2);
00078 
00079   PDMA_Configuration();
00080 
00081   I2C_Configuration();
00082 
00083   /* The I2C master-slave state is checked by software and data is read by PDMA.                            */
00084   I2C_Loopback();
00085 
00086   while (1);
00087 }
00088 
00089 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00090   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00091   * @retval None
00092   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00093 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00094 {
00095   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00096     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00097     CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA  = 1;
00098     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00099   }
00100 
00101   {
00102     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00103        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00104        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00105     */
00106     PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStructure;
00107 
00108     /* I2C Master Rx PDMA Channel configuration                                                             */
00109     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT->DR;
00110     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx;
00111     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkCnt = BufferSize;
00112     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_BlkLen = 1;
00113     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00114     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = H_PRIO;
00115     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_FIX | DST_ADR_LIN_INC;
00116     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_RX_DMA, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00117 
00118     /* I2C1 Slave Tx PDMA Channel configuration                                                             */
00119     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_SrcAddr = (u32) &I2C_Slave_Buffer_Tx;
00120     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_DstAddr = (u32) &HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT->DR;
00121     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_Priority = M_PRIO;
00122     PDMACH_InitStructure.PDMACH_AdrMod = SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX;
00123     PDMA_Config(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_TX_DMA, &PDMACH_InitStructure);
00124   }
00125 
00126   /* Enable I2C Rx GE & TC interrupt                                                                        */
00127   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_RX_DMA, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00128 
00129   /* Enable I2C Tx GE & TC interrupt                                                                        */
00130   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_TX_DMA, PDMA_INT_GE | PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00131 
00132   /* Enable the corresponding PDMA channel                                                                  */
00133   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_RX_DMA, ENABLE);
00134   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_TX_DMA, ENABLE);
00135 }
00136 
00137 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00138   * @brief  Configure the I2C.
00139   * @retval None
00140   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00141 void I2C_Configuration(void)
00142 {
00143   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00144     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00145     CKCUClock.Bit.I2C0       = 1;
00146     CKCUClock.Bit.I2C1       = 1;
00147     CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO       = 1;
00148     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00149   }
00150 
00151   /* Configure GPIO to I2C mode for Master                                                                  */
00152   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00153   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00154 
00155   /* Configure GPIO to I2C mode for Slave                                                                   */
00156   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_SCL_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_SCL_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00157   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_SDA_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_SDA_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_I2C);
00158 
00159   {
00160     /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00161        Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00162        Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00163     */
00164     I2C_InitTypeDef  I2C_InitStructure;
00165 
00166     /* I2C Master configuration                                                                             */
00167     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00168     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00169     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = ENABLE;
00170     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_MASTER_ADDRESS;
00171     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Speed = ClockSpeed;
00172     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_SpeedOffset = 0;
00173     I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00174 
00175     /* I2C Slave configuration                                                                              */
00176     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_GeneralCall = DISABLE;
00177     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_AddressingMode = I2C_ADDRESSING_7BIT;
00178     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_Acknowledge = ENABLE;
00179     I2C_InitStructure.I2C_OwnAddress = I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS;
00180     I2C_Init(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, &I2C_InitStructure);
00181   }
00182 
00183   /* Enable I2C0 & I2C1                                                                                     */
00184   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00185   I2C_Cmd(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, ENABLE);
00186 
00187   /* Enable PDMA send NACK automatically                                                                    */
00188   I2C_PDMANACKCmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, ENABLE);
00189 }
00190 
00191 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00192   * @brief  The I2C master-slave state is checked by software and data is read from the master to the slave by PDMA.
00193   * @retval None
00194   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00195 void I2C_Loopback(void)
00196 {
00197   /* Send I2C START & I2C slave address for read                                                            */
00198   I2C_TargetAddressConfig(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ADDRESS, I2C_MASTER_READ);
00199 
00200   /* Check on Master STA condition and clear it                                                             */
00201   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_SEND_START));
00202 
00203   /* Check on Slave Transmitter ADRS condition and clear it                                                 */
00204   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_ACK_TRANSMITTER_ADDRESS));
00205 
00206   /* Check on Master Receiver ADRS condition and clear it                                                   */
00207   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_MASTER_RECEIVER_MODE));
00208 
00209   /* Enable master I2C Master PDMA Rx request                                                               */
00210   I2C_PDMACmd(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT, I2C_PDMAREQ_RX, ENABLE);
00211   /* Enable slave I2C Slave PDMA Tx request                                                                 */
00212   I2C_PDMACmd(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_PDMAREQ_TX, ENABLE);
00213 
00214   /* wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00215   while (!PDMA_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_TX_DMA, PDMA_FLAG_TC));
00216 
00217   /* Send I2C STOP condition                                                                                */
00218   I2C_GenerateSTOP(HTCFG_I2C_MASTER_PORT);
00219 
00220   /* Check on Slave Receiver NACK & STO condition                                                           */
00221   while (!I2C_CheckStatus(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_SLAVE_RECEIVED_NACK_STOP));
00222 
00223   /* Clear I2C1 RXNACK flag                                                                                 */
00224   I2C_ClearFlag(HTCFG_I2C_SLAVE_PORT, I2C_FLAG_RXNACK);
00225 
00226   /* Check on validity of received data on I2C Master Buffer_Rx                                             */
00227   if (CmpBuffer(I2C_Master_Buffer_Rx, I2C_Slave_Buffer_Tx, BufferSize))
00228   {
00229     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED1);
00230   }
00231   else
00232   {
00233     HT32F_DVB_LEDOn(HT_LED2);
00234   }
00235 }
00236 
00237 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00238   * @brief  Compare two buffers.
00239   * @param  Buffer1, Buffer2: buffers to be compared.
00240   * @param  BufferLength: buffer's length
00241   * @retval None
00242   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00243 TestResult CmpBuffer(u8* Buffer1, u8* Buffer2, u32 BufferLength)
00244 {
00245   while (BufferLength--)
00246   {
00247     if (*Buffer1 != *Buffer2)
00248     {
00249       return Fail;
00250     }
00251 
00252     Buffer1++;
00253     Buffer2++;
00254   }
00255 
00256   return Pass;
00257 }
00258 
00259 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00260 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00261   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00262   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00263   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00264   * @retval None
00265   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00266 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00267 {
00268   /*
00269      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00270      Debug message can be added here.
00271      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00272   */
00273 
00274   while (1)
00275   {
00276   }
00277 }
00278 #endif
